name: Squealer Boy
description:
Try to sneak past the bullies and report them to the principal

This game was created in 24 hours during self-organised game jam.

Controls:

  • left/right arrow: move your character
  • hold shift: run
  • up arrow: enter the cabinet/door, climb the ladder

Known issues:

  • movement tends to randomly slow down, running is mandatory
  • sometimes climbing the ladder slows down
  • can't exit from main menu, alt+f4 key combination is needed to exit.
